verbs.description: After months of [ARG2: dangerous , childish Twitter brinkmanship] , [V: including] [ARG1: name - calling and threatening North Korea with “ fire and fury] , ” President Donald Trump decided to go all - in and gamble on an unprecedented face to face meeting with Kim Jong Un , in desperate attempt to change the conversatin from the myriad of scandals threatening to sink his presidency .
